FuncDef:
The source-ip command specifies a source IP address in an IP address verification list.
The undo source-ip command deletes a source IP address from an IP address verification list.
By default, no source IP address is specified in an IP address verification list.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the source IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Source IP address verification secures MPLS-in-UDP tunnels. To specify a source IP address in an IP address verification list, run the source-ip command.
